docs.text: Create Action Reaction Delete Action Reaction GitHub Action Reaction Weather Action Reaction
docs.title: Actions

docs.text: GitHub Description For any ActionReaction from github we need: { "githubName": "Name of the User on GitHub": string, "repository": "Name of the repository where the User want to put the webhook": string, "token": "GitHub Token of the User": string, "event": "Event GitHub for the webhook, there are defined in the /services/get route": [string] } Example: { "githubName": "python", "repository": "data-structure", "token": "dfsd458df...", "event": "push" } The reaction will occur when a Push in the repository data-structure of the GitHub python is trigger
docs.title: GitHub Action Reaction

docs.text: For any ActionReaction from github we need: { "githubName": "Name of the User on GitHub": string, "repository": "Name of the repository where the User want to put the webhook": string, "token": "GitHub Token of the User": string, "event": "Event GitHub for the webhook, there are defined in the /services/get route": [string] } Example: { "githubName": "python", "repository": "data-structure", "token": "dfsd458df...", "event": "push" } The reaction will occur when a Push in the repository data-structure of the GitHub python is trigger
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Weather Description The available actions are: Name Description temperature Action relative to the temperature pollution Action relative to the pollution temperature For the Action temperature { "city": "Name of the City to check": string, "temp": "Temperature to check": number, "option": "greater, less, equal; check to validate the reaction" } Example: { "city": "Paris", "temp": 20, "option": "greater" } The reaction will occur if the temperature of Paris is greater than 20 degrees For the Action pollution { "value": "Value of the air quality to check": number between 1 and 5, "long": "Longitude of the place": number, "lat": "Latitude of the place": number, "option": "greater, less, equal; check to validate the reaction" } Example: { "value": 2, "long": 2.0, "lat": 4.0, "option": "greater" } The reaction will occur if the air quality at 2.0,4.0 is greater than 2 air quality
docs.title: Weather Action Reaction

docs.text: The available actions are: Name Description temperature Action relative to the temperature pollution Action relative to the pollution
docs.title: Description

docs.text: For the Action temperature { "city": "Name of the City to check": string, "temp": "Temperature to check": number, "option": "greater, less, equal; check to validate the reaction" } Example: { "city": "Paris", "temp": 20, "option": "greater" } The reaction will occur if the temperature of Paris is greater than 20 degrees For the Action pollution { "value": "Value of the air quality to check": number between 1 and 5, "long": "Longitude of the place": number, "lat": "Latitude of the place": number, "option": "greater, less, equal; check to validate the reaction" } Example: { "value": 2, "long": 2.0, "lat": 4.0, "option": "greater" } The reaction will occur if the air quality at 2.0,4.0 is greater than 2 air quality
docs.title: temperature

docs.text: Create Action Reaction Create Action Reaction Description Success Response Error Response URL : /actions/createActionReaction Method : POST Description  Use to create an action reaction Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" } Data constraints { "action": { "service": "Name of the services" : string, "actionName": "Name of the action element" : string, "data": "Data needed by the action" : {} }, "reaction": { "service": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionName": "Name of the reaction element": string, "data": "Data needed by the reaction": {} }, "title": "Title Of the ActionReaction" } Data example { "action": { "service": "GitHub", "actionName": "push", "data": { "githubName": "python", "repository": "numpy", "events": "push", "token": "tokenGithub" } }, "reaction": { "service": "Area", "reactionName": "send_mail", "data": { "email": "user.email@gmail.com", "object": "reaction push" } }, "title": "Test" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "add successfully" } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 404 If actionName is found or error while creating action { "msg": "Error while creating, maybe its an unknown actionName or internal server error" } 500 If Other error { "Depend of the error" }
docs.title: Create Action Reaction

docs.text: Create Action Reaction Description Success Response Error Response URL : /actions/createActionReaction Method : POST
docs.title: Create Action Reaction

docs.text: Use to create an action reaction Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" } Data constraints { "action": { "service": "Name of the services" : string, "actionName": "Name of the action element" : string, "data": "Data needed by the action" : {} }, "reaction": { "service": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionName": "Name of the reaction element": string, "data": "Data needed by the reaction": {} }, "title": "Title Of the ActionReaction" } Data example { "action": { "service": "GitHub", "actionName": "push", "data": { "githubName": "python", "repository": "numpy", "events": "push", "token": "tokenGithub" } }, "reaction": { "service": "Area", "reactionName": "send_mail", "data": { "email": "user.email@gmail.com", "object": "reaction push" } }, "title": "Test" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "add successfully" }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 404 If actionName is found or error while creating action { "msg": "Error while creating, maybe its an unknown actionName or internal server error" } 500 If Other error { "Depend of the error" }
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: Delete Action Reaction Delete Action Reaction Description Success Response Error Response URL : /actions Method : DELETE Description  Use to delete an ActionReaction from an User Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string } Data constraints { "id": "ID of the ActionReaction": string } Data example { "id": "5f7ds65": string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "Deleted successfully": string, } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If firebase error { "firebaseError": "" } 500 If mongo error { "mongoDbError": "" }
docs.title: Delete Action Reaction

docs.text: Delete Action Reaction Description Success Response Error Response URL : /actions Method : DELETE
docs.title: Delete Action Reaction

docs.text: Use to delete an ActionReaction from an User Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string } Data constraints { "id": "ID of the ActionReaction": string } Data example { "id": "5f7ds65": string }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "Deleted successfully": string, }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If firebase error { "firebaseError": "" } 500 If mongo error { "mongoDbError": "" }
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: Create User Create User Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST Description  Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string, "username": "valid username": string } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User created please verify your email": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Create User

docs.text: Create User Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST
docs.title: Create User

docs.text: Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string, "username": "valid username": string } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User created please verify your email": string }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: Delete User Delete User Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Header { "tokenID": "'Bearer' + TokenID provided by firebase": string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User deleted": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Delete User

docs.text: Get Info User Get Info User Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/ Method : GET Description  Use to get info of the user with tokenid Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "uid": "uid of the user", "email": "email of the user", "name": "Name of the user", "services" : "services of the users" } serivces is : { "service": { "token": "token for the service", "refresh_token": "refresh token for the service", "connected": "If the user have activated this service" } } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Get User Info

docs.text: Get Info User Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/ Method : GET
docs.title: Get Info User

docs.text: Use to get info of the user with tokenid Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "uid": "uid of the user", "email": "email of the user", "name": "Name of the user", "services" : "services of the users" } serivces is : { "service": { "token": "token for the service", "refresh_token": "refresh token for the service", "connected": "If the user have activated this service" } }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: Sign User Sign User Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/signUser Method : POST Description  Use to sign a user in firebase with token Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Sign User

docs.text: Sign User Provider Sign User Provider Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/signUserProvider Method : POST Description  Use to sign a user in firebase with a provider Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase": string } Data constraints { "user": "user settings provided by firebase": {} } Data example { "user": "..." } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "value from db" } } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Sign User Provider

docs.text: Get All Services Get All Services Description Success Response URL : /services/getAll Method : GET Description  Use to get all services available Success Response Code : 200 OK Content List of all services available { "services": [ { "name": "name of the service" : string, "reactions": ["Reaction of the services"] : array, "actions": ["Action of the services"] : array } ] } Reactions and Actions have the same body type as follow: { "name": "Name of the action/reaction" : string, "inputs": /*inputs needed from the action reaction*/ [ { "name": "name of the input" : string, "type": "type of the input" : string } ] }
docs.title: Get All Services

docs.text: Get All Services Description Success Response URL : /services/getAll Method : GET
docs.title: Get All Services

docs.text: Use to get all services available
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content List of all services available { "services": [ { "name": "name of the service" : string, "reactions": ["Reaction of the services"] : array, "actions": ["Action of the services"] : array } ] } Reactions and Actions have the same body type as follow: { "name": "Name of the action/reaction" : string, "inputs": /*inputs needed from the action reaction*/ [ { "name": "name of the input" : string, "type": "type of the input" : string } ] }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Get Service Get Service Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET Description  Use to get actions reactions of a user service Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "id": "ID of the action/reaction": string, "actionService": "Name of the service for the action": string, "actionElement": "Name of the element of the action": string, "inputAction": "Input needed for the service action": string, "reactionService": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionElement": "Name of the element of the reaction": string, "inputReaction": "Input needed for the service reaction": string, } Error Response Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If error from Firebase { "firebaseError": "" }
docs.title: Get Service

docs.text: Get Service Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET
docs.title: Get Service

docs.text: Use to get actions reactions of a user service Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "id": "ID of the action/reaction": string, "actionService": "Name of the service for the action": string, "actionElement": "Name of the element of the action": string, "inputAction": "Input needed for the service action": string, "reactionService": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionElement": "Name of the element of the reaction": string, "inputReaction": "Input needed for the service reaction": string, }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If error from Firebase { "firebaseError": "" }
